product.longDescription: French half-long style shallot with classic teardrop shape, reddish-copper skin, and white flesh. Very similar to Ambition. High percentage marketable bulbs. Suited for very long storage. Adaptation: 40–60° latitude. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 112,600 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.

Matador Organic (F1) Shallot Seed

Product ID:4167G.114167G

French half-long style shallot with classic teardrop shape, reddish-copper skin, and white flesh. Very similar to Ambition. High percentage marketable bulbs. Suited for very long storage. Adaptation: 40–60° latitude. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 112,600 seeds/lb. Packet: 250 seeds.
